_sText:
de_hiekkasauna - Final V1 (???)
-
It's not really a final version if it is V1? Eh, it doesn't matter.
Even though this is my first map uploaded to GB, it's not my
first map. I've made around 3-4 little test maps (for CSS)
that I haven't released _anywhere_. I also have released
A3 of a TF2 arena map to TF2Maps (Look for it! arena_kaboom)
So I do have small experience of Hammer. :P
As for gameplay, you know the drill - CTs spawn at the cottage
(where the sauna is) and they have to protect the sauna from
the T's who are going to blow the whole place up
(I don't think this scenario has ever made sense. Why are
they going to blow the sauna up?)

Anyway, the credits:
--
-Zabidenu (me) for making the map

-Komaokc for the awesome skybox texture

-Pelihalli for having an AWESOME sauna map server!

-Sedaix and Fhindu for detail critique

--
As for installing,
--
simply drop it to your 
Steam\steamapps\*USERNAME*\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps
folder.

--

Well, that was it! Now go play it and have fun!
--
